nodes.text: Nigh Kris was a Male Human spymaster who was employed by Prodoranya the Hutt. During the Conquest of Makeb, Nigh Kris and Prodoranya's assassin J'virgo N'yen accompanied Prodoranya to Solida Hesk's resort on Makeb, where the two were killed.

Nigh Kris appears in the Star Wars: The Old Republic: Rise of the Hutt Cartel expansion to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as a Champion boss on Makeb. He is not directly involved in any quests, but can be killed for loot and as part of the achievement. This article assumes 100% game completion, which means she was killed.
